basic_info.name: RGMCET Kurnool Courses
description: Rajeev Gandhi Memorial College of Engineering and Technology College in Nandyal offers UG B.Tech course, PG M.Tech, MBA, MCA courses in various specializations. Apart from these, the institute also offers Ph.D. research programs on different subjects. The detailed information about the offered courses are as follows:

description: RGMCET AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.

basic_info.name: RGMCET Kurnool Admission
description: The candidates willing to get admission in any B.Tech course need to pass the Intermediate Examination of Andhra Pradesh State Intermediate Board of Education or any other equivalent examination along with Maths, Physics, and Chemistry as main subjects.

basic_info.name: RGMCET Kurnool Placement
description: RGMCET’s Training & Placement Cell consists of a Placement Officer, one faculty member, and one student from each department. Their role is to manage effective functionalities that make a good outcome.

basic_info.name: RGMCET Kurnool Scholarship
description: The RGMCET college in Nandyal offers a complete tuition fee waiver for their 4-year B.Tech course students who have ranked in between 1 to 10,000 in the EAMCET examination.

basic_info.name: RGMCET Kurnool Facility
description: Rajeev Gandhi Memorial College of Engineering and Technology has its own library inside the campus area, stationery shop, canteen, telecom center, and more. The college also provides hospital facilities, sports facilities, gym, banking facilities to the students as well as its faculty members. Besides these, the institute has well-equipped laboratories with all required test instruments and study materials.

basic_info.name: RGMCET Kurnool Faculty
description: The Institute has 200 most experienced and qualified faculties. Among them, 22 faculty members are Ph.D. holders. The faculty members always try to provide real-time examples to the students for making the course easy-to-understand. Dr. M. Santhi Ramadu is the chairman of this institute.

faqs.question: Does the college provide any Internships?
faqs.answer: Ans.No, the college does not provide any kind of internship program. It is the student’s individual decision to go for an internship.

faqs.question: Does Rajeev Gandhi Memorial College of Engineering and Technology Collegehave any accreditation for Training and Placement?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, the institute has been accredited by TCS for its full-fledged training and placement operations.

faqs.question: Does Rajeev Gandhi Memorial College of Engineering and Technology College have any skill development center?
faqs.answer: Ans.In 2016, the college has been recognized as the “Technical Skill Development Institute” (SIEMENS INC) by the Government of Andhra Pradesh in association with APSSDC.

faqs.question: Does RGMCET Kurnool provide reservation category seats?
faqs.answer: Ans.The college provides reservation category seats on the basis of government guidelines.

faqs.question: How do I reach Rajeev Gandhi Memorial College of Engineering and Technology in Nandyal?
faqs.answer: Ans.The college in Nandyal falls along National Highway 40. The nearest major railway station is Nandyal Junction. The nearest airport is the Kurnool Airport which is 40 kilometers away.

Section.name: About RGMCET
Section.description:
Rajeev Gandhi Memorial College of Engineering and Technology, Nandyal was inaugurated in the year of 1995. The institute is approved by the AICTE New Delhi and affiliated by JNTU, Anantapur. Besides these, in 2016, UGC granted this institute as “the College with Potential for Excellence”. This college is accredited by the NBA and is graded A+ by the NAAC. All UG eligible courses offered by this institute are accredited four times by NBA and recently in the Tier-I category. It is one of the topmost engineering colleges in Andhra Pradesh. Under the category of Engineering, the NIRF ranked the college at the 251-300 band position in 2020 throughout India. The institute also has been ranked 173 in the India Today of 2020.
